summary: U.S. government personnel at U.S. embassies and consulates continue to face security threats. During fiscal years 2013-2016, the State Department evacuated staff and their families from 23 overseas posts in response to threats, such as terrorism, civil unrest, and natural disasters. title: Embassy Evacuations: State Department Should Take Steps to Improve Emergency Preparedness
